definition[0]: used before a woman’s family name when she does not want to be called ‘Mrs’ or ‘Miss’, or when you do not know whether she is married or not
definition[1]: a US magazine for women, started by the feminist writer Gloria Steinem
definition[2]: a serious illness that gradually destroys the nerves, causing weakness and inability to move
definition[3]: a university degree in a science subject that you can get after your first degree
definition[4]: a title used before a married or an unmarried woman’s family name when being polite
example[1]: Is that Mrs or Ms?  (=used when asking how someone likes to be addressed)
